content.yext/description:
Founder of Community National Bank (Melville, New York), Community State Bank (Union Grove, Wisconsin) and Community National Bank (Pulaski, Virginia), Stuart H. Lubow is an entrepreneur and businessperson who has been at the helm of 9 different companies and presently occupies the position of President & Chief Operating Officer at Dime Community Bancshares, Inc. and President & Chief Operating Officer at BNB Bank (Bridgehampton, New York) and President for Dime Community Bank (both are subsidiaries of Dime Community Bancshares, Inc.). Mr. Lubow is also President at Dime Community Bank.

He previously held the position of Chief Operating Officer at New York Community Bancorp, Inc., Chairman, President & Chief Executive Officer of Community National Bank (Pulaski, Virginia), Chairman, President & Chief Executive Officer at Community National Bank (Melville, New York), Chairman for Community Bankers Association of New Jersey, President & Chief Executive Officer at Community State Bank (Union Grove, Wisconsin), President of Dime Community Bancshares, Inc., President & Chief Operating Officer for Bridge Bancorp, Inc. and Chief Operating Officer at Dollar Dry Dock Bank.

Stuart H. Lubow received an undergraduate degree from Moravian College.
